Reference version 0.1.0.9000

All functions

assign_limits

Function to assign EPA primary and seconday Maximum Contaminant Levels

boxplot

Boxplot function

check_units

Function to compare groundwater parameter units to EPA MCL data

compare_mcl

Function to compare result to EPA's MCL

conc_to_meq

Function to convert chemical data from mg/L to meq/L

connect_manages3

Connect to a MANAGES 3.x Site.mdb database

connect_manages4

Function to connect to MANAGES 4.0 database

constituents

Function to return a list of all the constituents

convert_units

Function to convert units

corr_plot

Create a correlation plot

dist_censored

Function to return distribution based on using p-value

est_dist_censored

Function to return either normal, lognormal, or non-parametric multiple groundwater data locations and parameters.

est_dist

Function to return either normal, lognormal, or non-parametric multiple groundwater data locations and parameters.

event_summary

Function to export summary table for a sampling event

export_OEPA

Function to export data from manages to excel format required by OEPA

from_csv

function to read data in csv format and convert date to POSIXct with lubridate

from_excel

function to read data in excel format

get_plot_data

function to read monitoring well data in the form location_id, sample_date, analysis_result, default_unit, param_name and gather parameters needed for geochemistry plots. The data is cast by location_id + sample_date ~ param_name

get_theilsen

Function to get slope and intercept from Theil-Sen slope for plotting

grubbs_flag

Function to flag outliers from Grubb's test for outliers

gw_data

Example groundwater quality data

include_dup

Function to include duplicate samples

indiana_data

Groundwater quality data for the state of Indiana

intra_pred_int

Function to calculate intrawell prediction interval

is_lognormal_censored

Function to check if censored groundwater data has a Lognormal distribution

is_normal_censored

Function to check if censored groundwater data has a Normal distribution

join_lt

Function to join columns of lt_measure and sample results

kendall_trend

Kendall Trend

manager

manager

mcl_heatmap

Plot for each mcl with location on x axis, MCL parameters on x axis

mcl

U.S. EPA Maximum Contaminant Level Lookup Table

name_units

Function to return a column of parameter name with units

nth_date

Function to find the date for next n samples

ohio_data

Groundwater quality data for the state of Ohio

percent_gt

Calculate the percentage of right censored data

percent_lt

Calculate the percentage of left censored data

piper_plot

Create a piper diagram

piper_time_html

Function to create an aminated Piper plot and save to html

piper_time_plot

Function to create an animated Piper plot through time using the animation package

pred_int

Function to calculate prediction interval

read_manages3

Function return a MANAGES 3.x Site.mdb database in memory

remove_dup

Function to remove duplicate samples Example: If you have wells named MW-1 and another named MW-1 Duplicate this function will remove the MW-1 Duplicate sample

replace_missing

Function to replace missing values

rosner_flag

Function to flag outliers from Rosner's test for outliers

sample_locations

Function to return a list of all the location IDs

schoeller_plot

Function to plot data transformed to schoeller coordinates using .transform_schoeller_data

series_plot

Function to plot a series plot of groundwater data

set_background

Function to return a column of background data

set_censored

Function to ensure non-detect data are set to either the PQL, or RL

set_proposed_background

Function to return a column of the proposed background data

start_date

Function to find the start of sampling for a well constituent pair

stiff_plot

Stiff Diagram.

stiff_time_html

Function to create an animated Stiff Diagram and save to html

stiff_time_plot

Function to create an animated Stiff Diagram

summary

Summary function

theil_sen_band

Function to calculate the Theil-Sen confidence band

to_censored

Function to convert character column of less than, or greater than symbols to logical vectors and return a data frame

ts_plot

This function plots multiple groundwater data time series by location, or constituent.

update_background

Function to update background data
